page.title: 19Playground Games
page.content: Many different games are played in our school playground such as Hide and Seek, Red-Rover, Donkey and Cat and Mouse. Many of the games require one player to be chosen to be "it" or "on". For instance in Hide nd Seek, the player who "seeks" is "on" or "it". A "dipping" rhyme is used to choose the player to be "on" or "it". Skipping is also very popular in the playground and again a rhyme is nearly always used to accompany the skipping. Below are some of the rhymes used in our playground. { { Dipping { { Dip dip do {The cat's got flu { The dog's got chicken pox {And out goes you!
